content:
Safe travels! I hope your work trip goes smoothly and that you get a chance to practice some yoga while you're away. Don't forget to stay hydrated, stretch your legs during the flight, and take breaks to move around.

And, of course, enjoy your Uber ride to the airport! You might even get a chance to relax, listen to some calming music, and mentally prepare for your trip.

Remember to double-check your flight details, packing list, and any travel documents before you head out the door. And, if you have any downtime during your trip, you could even squeeze in a quick yoga practice in your hotel room or find a local yoga studio near your destination.

Safe travels, and I hope you have a productive and relaxing trip!
